name: Spin Out of Control
description:
DAMN IT! I completely messed up the time zones...

Based on what I wrote on my calendar I still had 3h30 ahead of me...

I just realised I s͛t͛a͛r͛t͛e͛d͛ ͛l͛a͛t͛e͛ ͛a͛n͛d͛ ͛e͛n͛d͛e͛d͛ ͛l͛͛͛a͛͛͛t͛͛͛e͛͛͛.͛͛͛

I put 8pm PST instead of 8pm BST.

Seriously, there's just a ↄ between those !

Anyway, this is a nice little versus spinning top game. Made by me only, just in time (in my own space time) for a 48h submition. However, due to my mistake, it will not be featured as an entry to the GMTK 2020...

The music is NOT copyrighted and shouldn't trigger any strike bot.

Play it with controllers against your friends.

[Update] :

3 and 4 player modes added !

+ minor tweaks

[Future Updates] : (I'm not making it a "real game", I just want to complete it a little.)

AIs

More explainations in the tuto page

A slider option to decide how fast the recharge works

Better visuals and effects
